nodes.text: Motion detection goggles were a form of visor that saw use during the years of the Jedi Civil War. They were wrapped around the user's head and, with the aid of a built-in micro tracking processor, tracked movement and highlighted moving objects with color-coded warnings. This allowed the wearer to see moving enemies with ease, even those attempting to be stealthy. However, its effect could be disorienting, especially in the heat of combat.
